Seven //Menu License Help Changelog //Snackbar A short Break … … let\'s start again! Done! That\'s the first exercice. That\'s the last exercice. //Titles 1. Exercise - Jumping jacks 2. Exercise - Wall sit 3. Exercise - Push ups 4. Exercise - Abdominal crunch 5. Exercise - Step up on chair 6. Exercise - Squat 7. Exercise - Tricepts on chair 8. Exercise - Plank 9. Exercise - High knees running 10. Exercise - Lunge 11. Exercise - Push up with rotation 12. Exercise - Side plank Break - then: Wall sit Break - then: Push ups" Break - then: Abdominal crunch Break - then: Step up on chair Break - then: Squat Break - then: Tricepts on chair" Break - then: Plank Break - then: High knees running Break - then: Lunge Break - then: Push up with rotation Break - then: Side plank //License Dialog OK Copyright © 2016 by scoute-dich First of all: I am not a developer. I understand a few basics and most of my work is done by \"copy and paste\". A big thanks to all developers, who share their code on tutorials, on github or other places.

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses.

The pictures from the workout can be found on the Blog of \"C. Gilbert\" (http://almostfearless.com/the-21-minute-workout-or-7-minutes-if-youre-really-fit).Thanks to her for the permission to use them in the app. //Changelog Dialog For more informations visit the projectsite on github:
https://github.com/scoute-dich/Sieben

v1.:
• text to speech support
• code clenaup

v1.4:
• set screenorientation to portrait
• fixed project-link

v1.3.1:
• added Japanese translation (thanks to naofum)

v1.3:
• added swipe function (see help dialog)
• keep screen awake
• new dialogs (help/changelog)

v1.2:
• changed default language to english

v1.1:
• better integration of snackbar

v1.0:
• first release //Help Dialog Swipe on left: switch to next exercice

Swipe on right: switch to previous exercice

Swipe on bottom: make a break

Swipe on top: restart actual exercice
